name: Fling Block Breaker
description:
Fling is new style block breaker game.
Each ball has short life time. When ball reach the end of the life time, then it die.

The goal is you should hit same color ball with same color block in ball life time. For example, If you have red ball then you can break only red blocks. If you can't do this in ball life time then that is a mistake. You have only 3 mistake right. When you reach 3 mistakes then it is end of the game. You lose it.
